sentence: rotate the right purple block by 30 degrees and align it with the left side of the foremost red block
take the red block next to the previously moved block and stack it on the previous block
pick up the closest red block from the moved blocks and place it to the left side of the front purple block
bring the red block you have not moved yet and place it to the right side of the front purple block
place the yellow block closest to the moved blocks to the left side of the leftmost red block
